item.description:
Bonjour tout le monde! Do you love French language and culture?
For this meeting, there's a theme! Please come and tell us (in French, of course) about a film that you saw. It could be a recent film, or a favorite that you saw long ago. It doesn't have to be a French film, but the description should be!
Il ya beaucoup de gens who want to practice speaking French. They would like to parler avec vous! Venez prendre un caf√© and patisserie chez Panera. Look for the table with the Tour Eiffel!!
We meet the 2nd and 4th Wednesday of each month at 7PM.
Bienvenue!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the tables in the back with the Eiffel Tower!
item.why: The people are very nice and it is a nice atmosphere.

group.name: The West Hartford Groupe de French

item.name: The West Hartford Groupe de French February Meetup
